name: SampleSource
tag_list: sampling, product-sampling, cpg-sampling, mass-personzliation, customization, shopper-marketing
overview:
Helping consumers make smart shopping decisions by allowing them to “try before you buy”.

How? With free trial samples of top brand name products. Multiple product samples available from Tier 1 and 2 CPGs, all centralized in a one-stop site experience.

Our unique platform allows marketers to sample their products, precisely to the consumers they are looking for with efficiency and effectiveness never before seen in traditional sampling vehicles (zip code sampling, in-store demonstrations, street sampling etc).

We employ both real-time custom targeting filters AND the ability for our members to pick-and-choose what samples they would like to try.

Their self-selected samples get packed up in a personalized kit, and sent directly to their home so they can try the products.

We follow-up with custom benchmarking research as well as rating and review collection (thousands of members respond back - resulting in some of the largest research, rating, and testimonial base sizes per product on the entire web).

Our platform delivers far higher purchase rates, far less wasted marketing expense, and a unique mass-personalization experience for our members.
